mapper.select: SELECT A.ID , A.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBERID , C.ID AS CATEGORYID , C.NAME AS CATEGORYNAME , B.ID AS TYPEID , B.TYPE AS TYPENAME , A.CONTENT , A.TARGET_ID AS TARGETID , A.CREATED_AT AS CREATEDAT , A.REPORTED_MEMBER_ID AS REPORTEDMEMBERID FROM REPORT A JOIN REPORT_TYPE B ON A.TYPE_ID = B.ID JOIN REPORT_CATEGORY C ON A.CATEGORY_ID = C.ID

SELECT A.ID , A.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBERID , C.ID AS CATEGORYID , C.NAME AS CATEGORYNAME , B.ID AS TYPEID , B.TYPE AS TYPENAME , A.CONTENT , A.TARGET_ID AS TARGETID , A.CREATED_AT AS CREATEDAT , A.REPORTED_MEMBER_ID AS REPORTEDMEMBERID FROM REPORT A JOIN REPORT_TYPE B ON A.TYPE_ID = B.ID JOIN REPORT_CATEGORY C ON A.CATEGORY_ID = C.ID WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{id}
